00033 class ValuesDialogImpl: public QDialog, public Ui::ValuesDialog {
00034   Q_OBJECT
00035 
00036 public:
00037   ValuesDialogImpl (QWidget *parent = 0, Qt::WFlags f = 0);
00038   virtual ~ValuesDialogImpl() {}
00039 
00040   double tmin () { return atof (TMin->text ().toStdString().c_str()); }
00041   double tmax () { return atof (TMax->text ().toStdString().c_str()); }
00042   unsigned tsteps () { return TSlider->value (); }
00043   double dt () { return (tmax ()-tmin ())/double (tsteps ()); }
00044 
00045   double umin () { return atof (UMin->text ().toStdString().c_str()); }
00046   double umax () { return atof (UMax->text ().toStdString().c_str()); }
00047   unsigned usteps () { return USlider->value (); }
00048   double du () { return (umax ()-umin ())/double (usteps ()); }
00049 
00050   double vmin () { return atof (VMin->text ().toStdString().c_str()); }
00051   double vmax () { return atof (VMax->text ().toStdString().c_str()); }
00052   unsigned vsteps () { return VSlider->value (); }
00053   double dv () { return (vmax ()-vmin ())/double (vsteps ()); }
00054 
00055   double a () { return atof (A->text ().toStdString().c_str()); }
00056   double b () { return atof (B->text ().toStdString().c_str()); }
00057   double c () { return atof (C->text ().toStdString().c_str()); }
00058   double d () { return atof (D->text ().toStdString().c_str()); }
00059 
00060   int Function () { return FunctionBox->currentIndex(); }
00061   QString FunctionName () { return FunctionBox->currentText (); }
00062   void setFunction(const QString &f) {
00063       SingletonLog::Instance() << "ValuesDialogImpl::setFunction("
00064               << f.toStdString() <<") not yet implemented!\n";
00065   }
00066   int InsertFunction (const QString &FuncName, int index = -1);
00067

00069   virtual void accept ();   //  reimplementation of ValuesDialog::accept ()

00072   virtual void CheckNumeric (const QString &);

00075   virtual void bText (const QString &);

00077   virtual void dText (const QString &);
